post_message: The Boston Globe Wednesday demanded that Hillary Clinton shut down her family foundation if she wins in November because the entity "will always look too much like a conflict of interest for comfort."  "The Clinton Foundation is also clearly a liability for Hillary Clinton as she seeks the presidency," the newspaper said in an editorial. "The foundation should remove a political  and actual  distraction and stop accepting funding." - via Newsmax
